name: part_003
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブ】ねぽらぼみんなでアイドル衣装お披露目！【#ねぽらぼアイドル衣装】 [XxpA1P062Q0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The members of NePoLaBo (Lamy, Polka, Nene, Botan) are in their idol outfits, trying out different poses and joking around.
Polka takes the lead to announce the upcoming hololive events: hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 and hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish.
Polka provides information on where to buy streaming tickets and advises the audience to buy them early to avoid server congestion.
Details about the NePoLaBo members' performance days: Nene and Polka on Day 1, Lamy and Botan on Day 2. They recommend the 2-day pass.
Polka lists the highlights of the live event, including the AR stage, live band, and participation of English and Indonesian members.
Introduction of the new group song "Prism Melody," which will be performed for the first time at the 3rd fes. Nene shares her experience singing it.
Announcement of the official event goods, including T-shirts, penlights, and muffler towels, with a call to check the official website.

subtitles.original: はい、なんか、ほら、ちょっとアイドルポーズしな、ほら。
subtitles.english: Okay, come on, do some idol poses!

subtitles.original: えっと、真ん中ら辺の人ってないですよね。
subtitles.english: Um, the people in the middle don't have one, do they?

subtitles.original: 何してんの、お前らも、なんか、こういう原始的な感じがいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: What are you doing? Wouldn't something primitive like this be good?

subtitles.original: 原始的？
subtitles.english: Primitive?

subtitles.original: グー？いいわね、いいわね。あ、いいわね。
subtitles.english: A fist? Nice, nice! Oh, that's good.

subtitles.original: あ、でもさ、よくお前らこうやってやってんじゃん。
subtitles.english: But you guys usually do this, don't you?

subtitles.original: うん、でも真ん中だからさ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, but since we're in the middle...

subtitles.original: え、じゃあ端っこ行こうか。
subtitles.english: Then let's go to the ends.

subtitles.original: あ、やったー！
subtitles.english: Oh, yay!

subtitles.original: そっちのけでしてる、今。めっちゃ背伸びしてる。
subtitles.english: They're totally ignoring us. They're really stretching.

subtitles.original: こういう感じ？
subtitles.english: Like this?

subtitles.original: はっ！はっ！
subtitles.english: Hah! Hah!

subtitles.original: おいしょ！おいしょ！よしよしよし！よしよし！よしよし！
subtitles.english: Heave-ho! Heave-ho! Good, good, good! Nice, nice!

subtitles.original: ポルカ、大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Polka, are you okay?

subtitles.original: 何でそんな苦しそうなの？
subtitles.english: Why do you look like you're in pain?

subtitles.original: いや、分からん。
subtitles.english: I don't even know.

subtitles.original: ちょっと、何やってんだよ！
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you doing!

subtitles.original: え、なんだかんだで、でも、もうあれじゃね？
subtitles.english: Wait, after all that, isn't it time?

subtitles.original: え？あ、というわけで、ほら。
subtitles.english: Eh? Oh, speaking of which, look.

subtitles.original: もうそろそろね、私たちが集まった理由もあるでしょうに。
subtitles.english: It's about time, there's a reason we all gathered here.

subtitles.original: あ、そうですねー！
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right!

subtitles.original: この時間は一旦終わりです。
subtitles.english: This segment is over for now.

subtitles.original: えー！寂しいー！寂しい！
subtitles.english: Ehh! So sad! So lonely!

subtitles.original: みんな、あと1週間後に迫ったよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, it's coming up in just one week!

subtitles.original: そうだお！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: いろいろあるでしょ？それを、おさらいしていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: There's a lot going on, right? Let's review everything!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ついに近づいた、あと1週間後かよ！
subtitles.english: It's finally close, just one week away!

subtitles.original: 1週間後だよ！お楽しみですね！
subtitles.english: One week left! Looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: というわけで皆様、今週末！
subtitles.english: So everyone, this weekend!

subtitles.original: 3月19日と20日、hololive SUPER EXPO 2022！うわー！
subtitles.english: March 19th and 20th, hololive SUPER EXPO 2022! Whoa!

subtitles.original: そして、hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by ヴァイスシュヴァルツ、開催されます！
subtitles.english: And, hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Bushiroad, will be held!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！ふー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Woo!

subtitles.original: 2022.3.19 (SAT) - 3.20 (SUN) in MAKUHARI MESSE EVENT HALL
subtitles.english: 2022.3.19 (SAT) - 3.20 (SUN) in MAKUHARI MESSE EVENT HALL

subtitles.original: 現在、hololive 3rd fes. は、SPWN、ニコニコ動画で配信チケットを販売中になっております！
subtitles.english: Currently, streaming tickets for hololive 3rd fes. are on sale on SPWN and Nico Nico Douga!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 直前の購入だと、ちょっとサーバーが混雑しちゃったりするので、これマジで。
subtitles.english: If you buy right before it starts, the server might get congested, so seriously.

subtitles.original: 本当にそう。本当にそう。
subtitles.english: That's very true. Very true.

subtitles.original: 経験者は語る。早め、早めのご購入をお勧めします！
subtitles.english: Spoken from experience. We recommend buying early!

subtitles.original: お勧めしますー！
subtitles.english: We recommend it!

subtitles.original: そして次、ねぽらぼメンバーからは、DAY1！はい、ねね！ポルカ！
subtitles.english: And next, from NePoLaBo, on DAY 1! Yes, Nene! Polka!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！ああ、ねねじゃなかった！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Oh, I wasn't Nene!

subtitles.original: DAY2！はい！はい、ラミィ、ぼたん！が出演します！
subtitles.english: DAY 2! Yes! Lamy and Botan will be performing!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: We look forward to seeing you!

subtitles.original: で、ねぽらぼメンバー全員の頑張ってる姿が見たい人は通しチケットお勧めします！
subtitles.english: And for those who want to see all of NePoLaBo doing their best, we recommend the 2-day pass!

subtitles.original: お勧めしますー！
subtitles.english: We recommend it!

subtitles.original: 今日、明日、配信終了後から1ヶ月まで。そのライブの配信終了後から1ヶ月までがアーカイブ見放題なんで、
subtitles.english: From today, and tomorrow, until one month after the stream ends. You can watch the archive as much as you want for a month after the live,

subtitles.original: 何百回も見られちゃいます！
subtitles.english: so you can watch it hundreds of times!

subtitles.original: おー、やったー！
subtitles.english: Oh, yay!

subtitles.original: まあ、マスト、マスト。
subtitles.english: It's a must, definitely a must.

subtitles.original: 今回のライブ、全編ARでのライブステージになってたり、生バンドでの演出だったり、
subtitles.english: This live event will feature a full AR stage and performances with a live band,

subtitles.original: hololive English, hololive Indonesiaのメンバーも参加したり、とにかく今までにない挑戦が盛りだくさんとなっております！
subtitles.english: with members from hololive English and hololive Indonesia also participating. Anyway, it's packed with new challenges like never before!

subtitles.original: 繋がってるー！
subtitles.english: We're all connected!

subtitles.original: また、hololive 3rd fes. では、今日から、ん？配信リリースされている、
subtitles.english: Also, at hololive 3rd fes., starting from today... huh? Being released digitally...

subtitles.original: hololiveの新しい全体曲「Prism Melody」がライブ初お披露目されるそうです！うわー、すごい！
subtitles.english: hololive's new group song "Prism Melody" will be performed for the first time! Wow, amazing!

subtitles.original: あ、プリメロだー！
subtitles.english: Oh, it's PriMelo!

subtitles.original: これだこれだ、これ、これ！
subtitles.english: This is it, this is it!

subtitles.original: 「Prism Melody」は、はい、hololive 3rd fes. のために作られた新曲となってるらしいよ！
subtitles.english: Apparently "Prism Melody" is a new song made specifically for hololive 3rd fes.!

subtitles.original: あ、ぜ、ねねちゃんおる！見て見て！ねねちゃんおるじゃん！
subtitles.english: Oh, Nene-chan is there! Look, look! Nene-chan is in it!

subtitles.original: そうなんです、ねね一緒に歌わせていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: That's right, I got to sing it together with them!

subtitles.original: うわー、すごい！
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing!

subtitles.original: どうだった、歌ってみて？
subtitles.english: How was it, singing it?

subtitles.original: いや、あのね、すごいキラキラアイドル曲、前向きって感じ。
subtitles.english: Well, you know, it's a really sparkly idol song, very positive.

subtitles.original: あの、とっても覚えやすくて、たぶんみんなもね、1回聴いたらね、
subtitles.english: It's very catchy, so I think if everyone hears it once,

subtitles.original: あのサビの「Prism Melody」のところはすごい頭に入ってくるんじゃないかなと思います！
subtitles.english: the "Prism Melody" part in the chorus will really stick in your head!

subtitles.original: これはね、ライブの前までに予習してもらって、ライブで一緒に盛り上がってもらおうということで。
subtitles.english: So, we want you to practice it before the live so we can all get excited together.

subtitles.original: そうそう、ペンライト振るタイミングとかあるかもね！
subtitles.english: Right, there might be specific moments to wave your penlights!

subtitles.original: これはね、ライブで定番曲になるんじゃないかなって感じがしたね。
subtitles.english: I get the feeling this will become a staple song for the lives.

subtitles.original: ねー、あとこの構成がガチで神！
subtitles.english: And this composition is seriously divine!

subtitles.original: 最高です！
subtitles.english: It's the best!

subtitles.original: hololiveの歌うまたちが…そうなんだよ！素晴ら！素晴ら！
subtitles.english: hololive's best singers... Exactly! Splendid! Splendid!

subtitles.original: スバラ。スバラ。ねね、ねね。
subtitles.english: Splendid. Splendid. Nene, Nene.

subtitles.original: あと、はい、ライブといえば、グッズもあるよね！
subtitles.english: Also, speaking of the live event, there are goods too!

subtitles.original: そうだー！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: hololive 3rd fes. hololive SUPER EXPO では、ライブTシャツやペンライト、マフラータオルなどのライブの必須グッズがお買い求めいただけます！
subtitles.english: At hololive 3rd fes. and hololive SUPER EXPO, you can buy essential live goods like T-shirts, penlights, and muffler towels!

subtitles.original: 必須アイテム！取ったスペシャルグッズも盛りだくさん！
subtitles.english: Essential items! There are plenty of other special goods too!

subtitles.original: なになに、どこで買えるの？っていう購入の詳細、こちら、物販レギュレーションもあるので、
subtitles.english: Like, where can I buy them? For purchasing details and sales regulations,

subtitles.original: EXPO 3rd fes. のhololiveのこちらホームページ、グッズページに書いてあります。ぜひチェックしてみてくださいね！
subtitles.english: please check the goods page on the official hololive EXPO 3rd fes. website. Be sure to check it out!

subtitles.original: チェックしてみてくださいねー！
subtitles.english: Be sure to check it out!

subtitles.original: そして今回、ペンライトの…
subtitles.english: And this time, the penlight...
